name: New Year's Champagne Cocktail: Nutella Champagne Shooter
description: For me, nothing is as naughty as Nutella, which I eat with a spoon, straight from the jar.  No need to mess around.  This Champagne shooter is a small liquorish tribute to my sweet indulgence: chocolate and hazelnut liqueurs tempered with the bright-eyed, winking sparkle of Champagne.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip your finger in water and rub it around the rim of a small, wide old-fashioned champagne glass. Put the sugar in a shallow plate, and dip the wet glass rim into the sugar.
Careful to avoid wetting the sugar rim, pour the chocolate liqueur, Frangelico, and Champagne into the glass.
